original_text: The most important thing is that you continue to live in a good way. Live in the way that the good news about Christ teaches. I want to know that you agree together about the good news. And that you work together to show others that the good news is true. Whether I come to visit you or not, I want to know that you all help one another like that.
korean_text: 오직 너희는 그리스도의 복음에 합당하게 생활하라 이는 내가 너희에게 가 보나 떠나 있으나 너희가 한마음으로 서서 한 뜻으로 복음의 신앙을 위하여 협력하는 것과

sentences.original_text: is that you continue to live in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 계속해서 선한 방식으로 사는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that the good news about Christ teaches
that you agree together about the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들이 복음에 대해 함께 동의하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to show others that the good news is true
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들에게 복음이 참됨을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: Whether I come to visit you or not
I want to know that you all help one another like that
sentences.korean_translation: 내는 당신 모두가 그렇게 서로를 돕는다는 것을 알고 싶습니다
